name: Subalgebra.pi_toSubsemiring
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
R : Type u_2
S : ι → Type u_3
inst✝² : CommSemiring R
inst✝¹ : (i : ι) → Semiring (S i)
inst✝ : (i : ι) → Algebra R (S i)
s : Set ι
t : (i : ι) → Subalgebra R (S i)
⊢ Eq (Subalgebra.pi s t).toSubsemiring { carrier := (Submodule.pi s fun i => Subalgebra.toSubmodule (t i)).carrier, mul_mem' := ⋯, one_mem' := ⋯, add_mem' := ⋯, zero_mem' := ⋯ }
decl:
/-- The product of subalgebras as a subalgebra. -/
@[simps coe toSubsemiring]
def pi (s : Set ι) (t : ∀ i, Subalgebra R (S i)) : Subalgebra R (Π i, S i) where
  __ := Submodule.pi s fun i ↦ (t i).toSubmodule
  mul_mem' hx hy i hi := (t i).mul_mem (hx i hi) (hy i hi)
  algebraMap_mem' _ i _ := (t i).algebraMap_mem _

name: Subalgebra.coe_pi
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
R : Type u_2
S : ι → Type u_3
inst✝² : CommSemiring R
inst✝¹ : (i : ι) → Semiring (S i)
inst✝ : (i : ι) → Algebra R (S i)
s : Set ι
t : (i : ι) → Subalgebra R (S i)
⊢ Eq (↑(Subalgebra.pi s t)) (Submodule.pi s fun i => Subalgebra.toSubmodule (t i)).carrier
decl:
/-- The product of subalgebras as a subalgebra. -/
@[simps coe toSubsemiring]
def pi (s : Set ι) (t : ∀ i, Subalgebra R (S i)) : Subalgebra R (Π i, S i) where
  __ := Submodule.pi s fun i ↦ (t i).toSubmodule
  mul_mem' hx hy i hi := (t i).mul_mem (hx i hi) (hy i hi)
  algebraMap_mem' _ i _ := (t i).algebraMap_mem _

name: Subalgebra.mem_pi
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
R : Type u_2
S : ι → Type u_3
inst✝² : CommSemiring R
inst✝¹ : (i : ι) → Semiring (S i)
inst✝ : (i : ι) → Algebra R (S i)
s : Set ι
t : (i : ι) → Subalgebra R (S i)
x : (i : ι) → S i
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (Subalgebra.pi s t) x) (∀ (i : ι), Membership.mem s i → Membership.mem (t i) (x i))
decl: @[simp] lemma mem_pi : x ∈ pi s t ↔ ∀ i ∈ s, x i ∈ t i := .rfl

name: Subalgebra.pi_toSubmodule
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
R : Type u_2
S : ι → Type u_3
inst✝² : CommSemiring R
inst✝¹ : (i : ι) → Semiring (S i)
inst✝ : (i : ι) → Algebra R (S i)
s : Set ι
t : (i : ι) → Subalgebra R (S i)
⊢ Eq (Subalgebra.toSubmodule (Subalgebra.pi s t)) (Submodule.pi s fun i => Subalgebra.toSubmodule (t i))
decl:
open Subalgebra in
@[simp] lemma pi_toSubmodule : toSubmodule (pi s t) = .pi s fun i ↦ (t i).toSubmodule := rfl

name: Subalgebra.pi_top
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
R : Type u_2
S : ι → Type u_3
inst✝² : CommSemiring R
inst✝¹ : (i : ι) → Semiring (S i)
inst✝ : (i : ι) → Algebra R (S i)
s : Set ι
⊢ Eq (Subalgebra.pi s fun i => Top.top) Top.top
decl:
@[simp]
lemma pi_top (s : Set ι) : pi s (fun i ↦ (⊤ : Subalgebra R (S i))) = ⊤ :=
  SetLike.coe_injective <| Set.pi_univ _

name: Subalgebra.pi_mono
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
R : Type u_2
S : ι → Type u_3
inst✝² : CommSemiring R
inst✝¹ : (i : ι) → Semiring (S i)
inst✝ : (i : ι) → Algebra R (S i)
s : Set ι
t₁ t₂ : (i : ι) → Subalgebra R (S i)
h : ∀ (i : ι), Membership.mem s i → LE.le (t₁ i) (t₂ i)
⊢ LE.le (Subalgebra.pi s t₁) (Subalgebra.pi s t₂)
decl: @[gcongr] lemma pi_mono (h : ∀ i ∈ s, t₁ i ≤ t₂ i) : pi s t₁ ≤ pi s t₂ := Set.pi_mono h
